title: Xave Perry ’s Resume
text:
Computer Science Major at Brigham Young University - Idaho

perrshan2001@byui.edu | Data Science Program | LinkedIn | GitHub




Expected 2025 Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, ID

BS degree in Computer Science with a 3.80 GPA
Minor in Computer Engineering

2017-2020 Idaho State University, Pocatello, ID

A.A in General Studies with a 3.89 GPA





Languages: Python, C, C#, MySQL, Erlang, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Rust
Software Tools: Visual Studio Code, Tableau, Logism-Evolution, LTspice, STM Cube IDE, Eclipse





Designed a slide puzzle using C and a nucleo-I476 board
Created a 4-bit CPU to do basic math and display characters and numbers
Made an object-oriented banking program in C# using abstraction, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism
Created a basic network game that multiple players can connect to a play using Python and TCP connections.




2023-2024 Customer Care Representative, Melaleuca

Achieved Star Performer amongst all of the other customer care representatives
Earned a score within the top 20% of the other agents two months in a row
Chosen to be one of the few agents to take extra calls on the Riverbend Ranch phone line
Improved my average handle time increasing my volume of phone calls so that I could efficiently help more people each day

2022-2023 Custodian, Honest Cleaning

Cleaned a dental office and a plasma donation center both needing great attention to detail to keep patients and employees safe in medical environments
Applied feedback diligently to improve cleaning efforts to maintain building cleanliness according to the desired expectations of clients and employer
Planned hours of work to get all buildings ready for following day’s activities and never received any complaints keeping clients happy

2020-2022 Service Missionary, Austin, Texas

Worked and served 11 hours a day 6 days a week setting up appointments and teaching others
Kept an up to date data source that recorded all contacts that I had with those around me
Helped manage a Facebook page owned by the mission

2018-2020 Team Lead, Car Wash Express

Led team to complete daily requirements and made sure all tasks were done professionally and correctly
Entrusted with quickly troubleshooting issues causing cars to not be washed as to maintain customer safety and satisfaction by rebooting systems or clearing the path of the conveyor belt
Promoted seasonal savings by explaining promotions and encouraging clients to purchase offers and was always a top seller

title: About Me
text:
Xave Perry Picture




I am from Idaho Falls, Idaho and have been here most of my life. I have a wonderful wife and an amazing dog that make me very happy. I have a passion for coding and I have really enjoyed my time at BYU-I studying Computer Science.
